issue.title: Color CTA dark
issue.body:
For SB issue: https://github.com/SpiderStrategies/Scoreboard/issues/31066

New color needed for Select menu borders. Once the **scoreboard-colors** version is updated, I'll put in a PR in the Select project to fix the SB issue mentioned above.

comment.body: I think @nathanbowser typically updates the version number
